root: ^Ah, the brave knight! The tales of your courage precede you. Our land has been overrun by goblins who have taken refuge in the old mines scattered across Tiny Kingdom.
^There are four such dungeons, each hiding deep within our land.To reclaim our home, you must find and clear each of these goblin-infested mines.
^Only then will our village know peace again.Once you have vanquished the goblins from all four dungeons, return to us. Our future depends on your bravery.
